snippet: Chief William McManus of the San Antonio police pledged a thorough investigation of the fatal shooting of Antronie Scott by Officer John Lee.
abstract: San Antonio Police Chief William McManus says thorough investigation will be undertaken of shooting of unarmed man Antronie Scott by Officer John Lee.
lead_paragraph: Chief William McManus of the San Antonio police pledged a thorough investigation of the fatal shooting of Antronie Scott by Officer John Lee.

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Lee, John (San Antonio, Tex, Police Officer)
